name: Mr. and Mrs. Potato Head
overview: "Mr. and Mrs. Potato Head" is a 1985 educational game distributed by Random House, Inc. The box's back states: "Generations of children have enjoyed creating their own Mr and Mrs Potato Head characters. Now, for the first time, children can bring their creations to life! On Side 1, players can choose to animate one ot he ready-made friendly, funny potato characters or choose to mix and match body parts to create their own unique potato fol. SIde 2 contains Mr Potato Head and friends in three lively memory games deisgned to sharpen concentration and memory skills."
